abstract: Woman is attacked in middle of day in Bryant Park by man with machete; man is arrested and charged with assault; woman is in stable condition.
lead_paragraph: The victim suffered a “substantial gash on her right arm” during the midday attack, a Police Department official said.

headline.main: Man Slashes Woman With Machete in Bryant Park, Authorities Say

snippet: The victim suffered a “substantial gash on her right arm” during the midday attack, a Police Department official said.
